## Environment setup

```{r}
library(reticulate)
use_python("/Users/martin/anaconda3/envs/course_webapp/bin/python",
           required = T)
use_condaenv("course_webapp")
```

## Google API Installation

```{r, eval=FALSE}
conda_install(envname="course_webapp",
              c("google-api-python-client",
                "google-auth-httplib2",
                "google-auth-oauthlib"),
              pip=TRUE)
```
